practice_phrases.target: I want to say this in English.

practice_phrases.known: 我想知道怎么用英语说这个词。
practice_phrases.target: I want to know how to say this word in English.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想学习，所以我在尽力说英语。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to learn, I'm trying to speak English as hard as I can.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我很快就要开始说英语了。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm going to start speaking English soon.

practice_phrases.known: 我想和会说英语的人一起练习说话。
practice_phrases.target: I want to practise speaking with people who speak English.
